attributes.action: Give more potection for people who have to use self defence
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: No prosecution for people who have to use self defense to protect themselves or others. If someone attacks you it is reasonable to use whatever means to defend yourself, which is not seen under the law. I'm saying why should someone be prosecuted by the law for defending themselves from a burglar or an attack in the street or from road rage etc.
